rdf:Description.dcterms:creator: mgylling
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: This RDF vocabulary is a normative part of NISO Z39.98-2012(http://www.daisy.org/z3998/2012/z3998-2012.html). It defines a set of properties for use in the Z39.98-2012 Resource Directory document type.
rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Z39.98-2012 Resource Directory Vocabulary

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: reference
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A human-readable description of the purpose and structure of the entity described by this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: token-identifier
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A canonical string identifier for the entity described by this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: maintenance-agency
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: The identity of agency responsible for maintaining the entity described by this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: specification-compliance
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A reference to a specification which the entity described by this directory conforms to

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: version
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A version identifier for the entity described by this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: current-version-uri
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A URI resolving to the resource directory of the most recently published (current) version of the entity described by this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: version-history
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A reference to list of URIs that contains all available versions of the entity described by this directory

rdf:Bag.dcterms:title: Instance Conformance
rdf:Bag.dcterms:description: Resources related to testing whether instances satisfies the constraints expressed in this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normative-schemata
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: The normative schema(ta) for validation of instances satisfying the constraints expressed in this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: normative-prose
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: Normative prose regarding the application of the entity described by this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: schema-documentation
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: Human-readable documentation of a schema

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: prefix
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A prefix functioning as a symbolical short form for a URI

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: conformance
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: The conformance requirement of a resource: normative or informative

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: format
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: The language in which a schema is expressed

rdf:Bag.dcterms:title: Instance Conformance (Z39.98-2012 Profile Specific)
rdf:Bag.dcterms:description: Resources related to testing whether instances satisfies the constraints expressed in this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: z3998-instance name
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: The name by which a profile or feature must be identified in Z39.98-AI document declarations.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: z3998-feature
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A Feature supported by the Profile

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: z3998-rdfa-context
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: The canonical URI of the RDFa initial context document

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: examples
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: Examples of instances satisfying the constraints expressed in this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informative-schema-alt
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: An informative schema, alternative to normative schemas(#normative-schemata), for validation of instances satisfying the constraints expressed in this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: informative-schema-add
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: An informative schema, for use in addition to normative schemas(#normative-schemata)

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: module
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A subcomponent of a schema

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: default-css
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A cascading stylesheet suitable for use in instances satisfying the constraints expressed in this directory

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: supporting-software
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: Software that supports the entity described by this directory or instances satisfying the constraints expressed herein

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: archive
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: A downloadable archive of documents and resources referenced from this directory
